Log: ------------------------- Release 1.2.0.0 --------------------- + All new "Event Gallery" function! YAY!!! + Gallery: "admin mode" for Gallery (click on lock icon in sharing screen, enter passcode and print any count of photo) + Gallery: open gallery in admin mode directly from "booth screens" menu + Gallery: time cut-off function + Camera: new zoom function in camera menu + Render: new copy content to additional folder function + Application loading speed has been improved + Booth mode loading speed has been improved + The color correction menu is now accessible from the main menu + Improved app stability + Fixed some freaky bugs ;)
